website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses most competitors in terms of durability and designed by a well-known furniture brand.
pros: Owners report that this unit arrives well-packaged, is fairly easy to assemble, and is both heavy duty and stylish
It gets top marks for elegant design and sturdy construction
cons: Some had challenges with assembly, and the quality of the screw covers could be improved

website_summaries.verdict: Offers a modern look and a sturdy, heavy construction, but be sure to check it upon arrival to make sure that all the wood arrived in one piece.
pros: Finish is a jamocha wood color
Simple assembly that takes about an hour
After assembly, unit is heavy and strong
cons: Plastic screw covers are hard to snap into place after construction
Some buyers report that this bookcase arrived with broken or damaged wood

customer_reviews.title: Pleased Overall
customer_reviews.text: The bookshelf was delivered and had a few minor scratches, but nothing that made it worth sending back for a new one. All in all, I am pleased with this product. The assembly instructions were clear and the shelf fits well in the space.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: Product quality very good. Very heavy. Took a little longer than I expected to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the money
customer_reviews.text: Of course it's made from particle board, all furniture now a days is. Not a deal breaker. The verticals are pressed cardboard but everything else is wood. Take your time putting it together and it's great. Sauder is a good brand and never been disappointed. If you want real wood build it yourself or spend 3 times this to find one. I'm happy with my purchase and recommend it
customer_reviews.author: TClark

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Product At a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shelf to displays my action figures and this product stood out with overwhelmingly positive reviews from other customers, more so than other similarly looking shelves so I decided to purchase one. I was not disappointed. It is as if the shelf was specifically made to display my figures, that illustrates how good of a design this is. The item arrived very well-packaged and the assemble was relatively simple and fast. All the parts fits together nicely with minimal effort. Although it is not as sturdy as I would have like, it works well at what I want it to. At the bottom line, this is a good product and is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cornwall

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy, Well Made Trestle Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed and constructed trestle 5-tier bookcase. I bought 2. The first one I tried using a Phillip's screwdriver for assembly. My weak wrists couldn't handle that job. My husband came to the rescue with an electric screwdriver. The 2nd bookcase I assembled quickly with a new No Cry Stubby Ratcheting Screwdriver set. I highly recommend using a ratcheting screwdriver for faster, painless assembly. Learning the hard way, read, understand, and follow the instructions carefully!
customer_reviews.author: Chiwauka

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Sturdy Shelf
customer_reviews.text: This stylish, sturdy shelf provides plenty of room for all those things you might want to display. With a generous 12" between each of the five shelves, even large books will fit, and the shelves are a full .5" thick, so no bowing or warping under the weight of even a full shelf of books ( or rocks😉). Excellent value for the price. Comes packed very securely so there is no shipping damage to any pieces. Assembly was easily completed within an hour.
customer_reviews.author: BethG58

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It’s not bad for most of it not being solid wood. It’s kind of what I expected. It’s a good item, but not amazing. It’s not super easy to assemble, but it’s not super difficult either. Good for the price. Overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Valeren

customer_reviews.title: Don't be misled
customer_reviews.text: Don't be misled. There is no wood in this product. It is all MDF (medium density fiberboard). I needed to be able to actually use this as a type of ladder but I cannot trust the fiberboard to hold my weight (140lb). I have an older version of this bookcase but it is made of actual wood and is very sturdy. I was hoping that this is be at least of similar quality but it is not. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sky1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Arrived very fast!
customer_reviews.text: I received this in less than 48 hours! I ordered it late Tuesday evening on November 6th and it was at my front door Thursday, November 8th when I got home after work at 3:30! I was so impressed with how fast I got this shelf! It was easy to put together. My husband and I did it together and it took about a half an hour. A little tedious, but we knew that before we started so it wasn't a big deal. The bottom shelf holds our 45-50 pound fish tank, which is why we went with the product vs. others. We thought it would be wider, but overall we are very happy with the shelves!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTY NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Strong and solid...  kind of a PITA to assemble, but nothing too challenging.
customer_reviews.text: If you like the design... this thing is for you. The layout and assembly was a bit cumbersome... but I could have been in a mode where I thought it would be SUPER simple... and didn't consider how many little parts there were. BUT... in the end, nothing got damaged, the parts were all there. It looks awesome and is SUPER stable. I build furniture and just didn't want to have to make anything for this application and this was perfect, so I bought it. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Doll

customer_reviews.title: This looks great, and assemblies easily
customer_reviews.text: This looks great, and assemblies easily. The worst part about this product, are the plastic screw covers. They're terrible, and nearly impossible to get into place properly. Everything else is spot on, but those covers are the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking inexpensice shelves
customer_reviews.text: I had space for such a shelf in my bedroom, and things I wanted to put on it. My dream shelving was over $800. This for just over $100 works just as well, looks almost as nice, was more work, I am sure, to put together, and yet the instructions were excellent. It would have been easier, putting this together, with a second, or even a third person to help but I did it by myself. It looks as nice as it does in the ad. It is sturdy, for the kind of shelf it is. Not for a ton of books. I would recommend this shelf highly, for the price it is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high-quality
customer_reviews.text: First of all, they hired the BEST technical writers to write the direction. They added comments like : Get a drink now. Time for a snack, and time to refill your drink. Awesome humor to get you through some of the tedious tasks. Time consuming but sturdy and quite beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ladder shelf
customer_reviews.text: It amazes me how many books this thing can hold! We were planning on buying two but after purchasing this one we decided that it met all of our needs! It did take some time to put together but it was very simple. It would definitely be easier for two people to put this together just to get it to standing position and moving it to it's permanent location.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and handsome
customer_reviews.text: We assembled it easily. Instructions are clear and sometimes amusing. Shelving is sturdy and handsome. One problem: we haven’t yet succeeded in anchoring to the wall; we used the drywall screw and the included washer, followed instructions for drywall attachment, and it didn’t work. Though it seems stable, the piece is tall and heavy, so we’ll investigate other devices for attaching. (We wouldn’t want the whole thing to fall on a rambunctious great grandchild. )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look and value!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, the price and the sturdiness, so far. It serves the purpose for the purchase. It took the place of an old glass-metal etergere which had been a cause of concern with two toddler-age grandchildren who were returning for their weekly visits after a three-month shelter-in-place. But it was not easy to put together. It took my husband a whole afternoon and needed me to assist toward the end to put the sides together. I did not know it needed wall-anchor attachment, but one was included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Product as described received with no issues or problems. A little darker than the rustic oak piece I was trying to match but a fairly close and looks ok. Assembly easier than other products I have encountered, the instructions were clear and I was able to complete without outside assistance. I tried to cover the screws with the "small" included covers but some kept falling off. I believe I will buy some furniture retouching paint which should solve the issue and hide the screws.
customer_reviews.author: JoeR

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot but...
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a heck of a time putting it together. The pieces on the bottom and top keep falling out as the connectors do not fit right. I will glue them somehow eventually. I still think it's pretty and i can think of a lot of places to put it and how I want to decorate it. Pay attention to direction when setting it up and plan on adding glue here and there to keep it together.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to assemble it, about an hour or so, but it's very sturdy and looks great. Perfect for my sons room, and hold tons of books.
customer_reviews.author: smaldon

customer_reviews.title: Solid and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at how sturdy this was. After assembly, it was very solid looks great. Make sure you look at the dimensions as I thought it was a little smaller. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: VAreviews

customer_reviews.title: I love the finish and the idea of it but putting ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the finish and the idea of it but putting it together was something else. The hidden cams don't seem to make a solid connection everytime and the shelves don't feel solid. It is difficult to keep the parts stable as you build and it is easy to have them fall and break. I would rather be able to screw things together and have them be solid at each step.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Looks fairly nice
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy took about a half hour for me. Put together it looks fairly nice and is quite sturdy. Only issue I had was with some of the plastic screw hole covers most of them broke when putting them in or fell out shortly after. Luckily I did manage to get covers into the screw holes that can be seen easily. The rest I wasn't concerned with.
customer_reviews.author: gduncan229

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and functional!
customer_reviews.text: We liked the item however a few pieces were dented and scratched. We decided to keep the item because we didn’t want to deal with replacement shipping, etc. The scratches fortunately aren’t visible to guests so only we know we paid for something in less-than-perfectly new condition. A bummer, but time is also money and the headache of re-packaging, shipping back, waiting, etc. was not worth our time on this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I’m so mad because it was missing a vital screw.. I got so mad and just screwed a larger one I had through the outside and into the bottom last shelf. It’s also a little shaky. But it’s nice shelf.. I just have to cover up a screw in the bottom outside leg now because i couldnt wait to contact them and wait to weeks for one screw to arrive and have this giant layed down shelf in the middle of my living room ready for my toddlers to climb on 😓
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla T.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shelf as a charging station for all devices when not in use. Since everyone is working and schooling from home we needed something. We don't have space for so many desks so now the kids can take the device from the station and find a quiet spot at the table or bedroom. It was easy to put together and seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cali.grown

customer_reviews.title: Great tall, sturdy piece
customer_reviews.text: Great tall, sturdy piece! Was super easy to assemble! Has a good number of parts but all you need is a phillips head screwdriver. The package is heavy but each part is not so don't need more than one person... just follow directions and you are golden. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the project in mind
customer_reviews.text: Assembled quickly, sturdy and didn't required being bolted to the wall to seem secure. It's price is affordable. Very pleased with all Sauder projects we've assembled.
customer_reviews.author: MzMo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the Saunders 424121 Trestel 5 level bookcase,The oak finish pretty much matches the description on Amazon. Was fairly simple to put together, the hardware will fit perfect, Looks Sturdy. Very happy with the product..
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Vito

customer_reviews.title: ... unit arrived on time and the box was in good condition. It took me less than an hour ...
customer_reviews.text: This shelving unit arrived on time and the box was in good condition. It took me less than an hour to assemble. The wood was in perfect condition. The unit is very sturdy and exceeded all of my expectations. I used the measurements before I ordered to make sure it would fit where I needed it and it did. This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: jennllm

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ladder book case. Found some other styles but nothing really caught my eye. Either too short, too tall, too wide, etc., this one has perfect dimensions. I was able to put some books, decor, picture frames and the end result was just perfect. Considering ordering another one for the other side of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey3589

customer_reviews.title: Love these bookshelves!!
customer_reviews.text: Excuse the mess on my dining table, I’m normally much more organized. LOVE these bookshelves. Exactly what I wanted and needed. Dark espresso color. Sturdy. Easy to assemble. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Vampire

customer_reviews.title: Great Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous when I opened the box and there was tons of pieces but no instructions included. Thankfully, though, I was able to go to the Sauder's website and request a set of instructions be emailed to me - they arrived very quickly, maybe within half an hour or so. While construction was fairly easy and I was able to build this completely on my own, I'd recommend this as more of a two person job. Once together, this bookcase is exactly what I wanted. It's beautiful and sturdy (it even includes equipment to anchor it to the wall, though I did not use it). Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: Assembly holes drilled in the wrong location
customer_reviews.text: The bookcase is made improperly. The rear horizontal slats are supposed to be drilled to have screws put through them to go into each shelf. However the holes are predrilled one inch below each shelf. So I have to drill all new holes then find a way to cover the unsightly holes that are visible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would Have Been A 5 But the Faulty Instructions
customer_reviews.text: It is really really a lovely shelf. It stands nice and sturdy - or it would have been a lot more sturdy if the instructions had been more clear. Some of the pieces like 'N' were not labeled in any way. And what is more annoying is that how to attach the 'L' piece on both the top and the bottom of the shelf is not shown. I bought 3 of these so it was not a fluke, ALL of them are like that. Great Shelves. Sloppy Instructions.
customer_reviews.author: C.T

customer_reviews.title: Baubles? Sure. Books? Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It's wasy to assemble (for a bookcase) and it's pretty sturdy, but it's super narrow. For the price, you're not getting a lot of book space. I just moved and am trying to find nicer quality and looking bookcases and thought I found it in this. I guess that's kind of right? It's nice, but as you can see doesnt fit a ton of books. It fit less when I put them in the traditional way. If you're looking for aesthetic and not purpose, these would work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sherilyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly ! You can do it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very sturdy, and easy to assemble! Ordered 2 of them for our bedroom. Using as night stands as you xan see from pic. Instructions are easy step by step, and all you need is a Phillips screwdriver. Took maybe an hour each with break's of course. At one point you may need help, but I did it by myself. Great product! Wife is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Piece!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous addition to my living room. I recently got a vinyl player and needed something to put my vinyl on, this is so perfect! I had a time putting it together, it says it is a two person job and I attempted it all on my own. If you have a friend to help I'd say to grab them and have them help you out. The instructions were very clear though.
customer_reviews.author: sfmarti2

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my figure collection! It is super sturdy and looks way more expensive than it is. It was easy enough to put together, though I would recommend two people for when you have to line up the screws and camlock holes. I definitely eventually want more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Tom and Lariisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item, no good assembly
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice and sturdy but the assembly was a nightmare, all the screws were together and no separate and labeled like other furniture that I have bought before, and also didn'thave signs indicating button ot top, that's why I had to assemble twice, when it was done it was lose and dansing and I know that I cramped very good each screw that's why I am not completely happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Coral Yepez

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks super great! Wayfair has the same thing for almost double the price. This is definitely sturdy and gleams with an anchor for the wall. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bradenkatie

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces, good support
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a few months ago but haven't had time to put it together. I finally had time, opened it up, and found one of the long leg pieces with paint peeled off. It was also missing 1 essential screw. I filled out the support form for replacement parts. They sent them within about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Puneet

customer_reviews.title: Goes together fast and looks really nice. I've seen ones that cost a lot more ...
customer_reviews.text: Goes together fast and looks really nice. I've seen ones that cost a lot more not look as good. My one gripe is all the screws that come together at the top, just under the top of the unit. All the plastic tabs you have to put over the screws in that one location look really cheesy. I'm going to take them off and put some dark brown paint on the screws instead. It's also in a dark part of the room, so it doesn't show. And I'm not sure how you could fasten it all together without having multiple screws there.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these for our study and we love them! They hold a lot of books and keep the room open.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shelf. It's sturdy and was easy to assemble, thanks to hilariously funny and incredibly clear instructions. I'll be looking for more pieces from this brand. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Check all parts before assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I did not notice until the unit was almost assembled that one of the shelves did not have a finished edge. Was hoping to get this done on the weekend. Very frustrating. I was able to request a replacement part fairly easily from the Sauder website. Will see how that works. Might upgrade the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The shelf came packaged pretty well with extra cardboard around the corners of the package. However, when I opened it, I noticed that one of the legs that sticks out on the bookshelf already had a large dent in it that shows after the shelf has been put together. Besides that, the directions were easy to follow and all of the pieces were there. Pretty disappointed that it was damaged though.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture, hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: I don’t leave many reviews, but for this shelving unit with a matching desk and hutch it’s breathtaking piece of furniture. But expect to spend an astronomical time to assemble it. Just prepare with some whiskey and snacks and you’ll be fine. It’s worth the effort that you put in with assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K. Peters

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the quality, I loved the price and I loved the style! I was looking for a bookshelf for so long until i came across this one. Thank goodness too because it went so well in my room. I really loved it and would highly recommend to anyone who is contemplating buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Anahi

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 to house my ever expanding number of books and knock knacks! They work beautiful and I LOVE THEM! They were hard to assemble, need at least 2 people and hopefully tall!! One of the shelves , I could not get one of the screws in coz the holes did not line up, but it seems to be holding up regardless.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thilak

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Received fast. Husband found it easy to put together and had it done when I got home. Love the ladder design. Put it on lanai and the Jamocha color was perfect with our dark brown patio furniture. Holds a lot of knick knacks from our travels. Modern looking. Got it when it went on sale, great buy. Love the prime with Amazon. Makes shopping so easy and you get everything fast.
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Tall Trestle-Easy Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the side of my closet where my bedroom opens up to. It really dressed the area up and gave great function. The stores around me seem to only have short ones that were not as wide. This fit the area like a glove. It is a self build product, so the quality is as expected, but not cheap garbage. Very sturdy and elegant. Instructions were easy to read and while it said to use 2 people, I was able to build and set by myself in about 30min.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble and SUPER sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical ordering a heavy duty shelving unit off of Amazon. Surpassed my expectations and I love it! Was very easy to assemble, you can do it yourself but need 1 person to assist you on one of the last steps. Takes about 1 1/2 hours to assemble. Everything is clearly labeled and very user friendly. Great shelf and amazing color!
customer_reviews.author: Craig M

customer_reviews.title: A solid bookshelf, exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Delivered right to my front door, with no packing issues or damage. All pieces included, simple to put together with easy to follow instructions. Measurements spot on... fits perfectly in the designated space. Be careful not to throw away the little stabilizer strap that's floating around loosely in the box. The only issues were the time it took to put it together, and the wear on my hand from the screwdriver :)
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bice

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Simple
customer_reviews.text: I love these shelves so much! They are very sturdy and well made. They look so beautiful in my living room with my plants and books. My boyfriend helped me put them together so it wasn’t difficult, but took a couple hours and I think is best to do with another person. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Trimbath

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and style.
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. My daughter passed away so I’m using it as an alter type to have her pictures and some items of memory.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece for my photo books
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous! I was unsure until I got it and saw it in person. The photo does not do it justice. It's a beautiful addition to our living room. It's very sturdy and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: amazing shelf for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Package shipped on time and is made of sturdy materials. It did take 2 of my friends to help me with carrying it up the stairs and building it, but overall the instructions were helpful and once completed it is a great size for the space I have and brings a unique vibe to the space. It is truly everything I had been wanting! This leaning shelf holds a lot more books than I expected and I even have room for decorations. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karlee

customer_reviews.title: Fine piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Several reviews mention difficulty assembling and they're right. It took me + 2 other sets of hands to help with positioning. Definitely worth the headache though. The shelf is sturdy and well made, and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M

customer_reviews.title: very gorgeous bookcase ladder
customer_reviews.text: I got the chalkboard color which goes perfectly with my new house My husband put it together with no problem but this is something you wouldn't want to put together as your first try its very sturdy and looks great I'd recommend purchase to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Sandieson

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf!!
customer_reviews.text: Like the height of this shelf. Quality is good. May need two people to assemble as it was a little tricky/difficult putting together by myself. May end up buying another one for the house.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. I ordered the rustic oak color and it is perfect. Considering ordering two more in grey for the dining room. Easy to assemble, great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Loulah

customer_reviews.title: it's not bad. I put all kinds of things on this ...
customer_reviews.text: It definitely doesn't take over 3 hours to build. It took me 2 hours, just because I assembled them incorrectly, so I had to redo it. Give it 1.5 hours. Seriously, it's not bad. I put all kinds of things on this shelf. Books, pictures, plants, etc. Fairly sturdy; the manual also has a load rating for each shelf. The bookshelf overall looks visually appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my remodeled office (not quite finished yet - don't mind the missing baseboard). Very sturdy shelf!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to assemble, Upscale appearance
customer_reviews.text: This Sauder shelf is very sturdy and secure. It is used in our guest room for smaller items (perfumes, photos, books, etc). The shelf blends well with the decor and looks classy (not cheap). We would buy again from Sauder.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Short

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bookcases!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these - they are nice bookcases. Although heavy and a lot of pieces it was easy to put together. The manual says that a drill isn't needed - if you don't want tired hands trying to screw into the particle board material then the drill isn't bad to use. That's just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rival

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Sturdy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed it for! Does not take up a lot of room and has great storage space. The color is a beautiful neutral grayish beige and it mixes well with other furniture. Easy to put together in about 30-45 min. All you need is a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these (wait till they go on sale) for a reasonable price and am incredibly impressed at how sturdy and nice they look an
customer_reviews.text: I had been on the hunt for A-Line shelfs for awhile, but none were ever fitting the bill. Ordered these (wait till they go on sale) for a reasonable price and am incredibly impressed at how sturdy and nice they look and feel. Installation wasn't necessarily hard, but there were a couple tricky places but I managed with no real troubles installing 2 of these in about 1-2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Overall very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about assembling this by myself, but it was not difficult. The only part that I struggled with was the very top screws, which still are not all the way in so are not topped with the plastic covers. Aside from that, the instructions were self explanatory and all pieces fit very well together. I did not use the wall anchor as it is placed in a corner, but it looks great and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH K.

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I like the style of the shelves but I don't believe ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have put these together as soon as they arrived but just now got around to it. It's too late to send them back and they were busted up when I opened the box. One of the shelves is cracked down the middle and split on one end. Other than that I like the style of the shelves but I don't believe the quality is acceptable for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: TammyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: beautiful modern shelf
customer_reviews.text: I bought this "ladder" to replace two bookcases. I minimized the books and added vases, etc. Beautiful addition to our family room. It definitely updates our room.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Laedlein

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! It’s not to difficult to assemble, takes some space and patience.... but it’s well built. The exact color word I was hoping for. Dimensions are correct and ideal for my needs. I am 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ben K.

customer_reviews.title: very wobbly
customer_reviews.text: First had to contact Suader directly for some replacement parts that came scratched badly. Once constructs, the shelf wobbles pretty badly. Glad I bought this at one of the lowest prices at the time. It's also a little narrow. Sauder products in general are kind of poorly made, not sure why I thought this would be better but after fiddling with cardboard under some of the legs and getting some weight on the shelves, the wobble is less noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Stand!
customer_reviews.text: This really surprised me. I was expecting something somewhat cheap, but the quality is very good and sturdy. I have even gotten compliments on it and friends asking where I purchased this. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Just what I wanted!! It arrived early, my daughter- in- law put it together without a hitch. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: What a great find! Product came well packaged and all pieces were in perfect condition. Color is beautiful and rich. Took some time to assemble, but directions were very clear and I was able to build by myself. Item is being used in our family room to display our holiday decorations.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY F.

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: This is the bookshelf assembly from HELL Pieces were not labeled, nothing was really labeled actually... took three hours to put together laughed at the absurdity so hard I nearly cried. I would never attempt to put this together again even having had put it together now I look at the shelf and want to burn it. The shelf looks like it does in the photo after much work and im sure will hold books just fine but there are many many easier shelves out there.
customer_reviews.author: Russes

customer_reviews.title: Utility and Beauty
customer_reviews.text: No "reengineering" required....holes lined up, hardware easy to install. It took two of us two hours to "build." The finished product is sturdy and the shelving, engineered wood, is finished well. Made in USA is a bonus! Well packaged. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jannie

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2. No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. Would definitely by again. Was a slight pain putting them together but instructions were pretty clear.
customer_reviews.author: Mary.p

customer_reviews.title: No hardware for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Although I really do like the wood coloring of the bookcase, when we ordered this item there were no screws or CAMs, no hardware to assemble it. We had to call Sauder customer support and they said that they would ship the parts but now it will take 3-4 business days to get them. This is really unacceptable and I hope that they figure out why it happened so that it doesn’t happen to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Vinoo Dissanayake

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my home office. Granted with the current COVID 19 situation and lack of work, I was hesitant to purchase. I was going to return it but decided to keep it before opening. So we opened it and put it together and immediately the top of the structure broke off! What the heck? How is it supposed to hold books if it broke putting it together. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. Very Ikea like quality should've been 40 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Ford

customer_reviews.title: ... of junk together and fit and finish is the worst. Seams where overlaid onto particle board do not ...
customer_reviews.text: Just finished putting this piece of junk together and fit and finish is the worst. Seams where overlaid onto particle board do not match up and the color is puck brown, about 4-5 of locks pulled loose from particle board. I would like to send this back but the hassle of taking it back apart and re boxing is not worth it. This was going into an office but now going into trash.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: The one I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly. Quite heavy. Not too easy to assemble, but doable (definitely not IKEA). Quite stable. We placed it in the corner, so we didn't do additional fixation to the wall. Looks good, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Bakunin

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go in my daughter's room. I love the openness of it so it's not just a big dark shelve, and to top it off it's sturdy and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and gorgeous for the price
customer_reviews.text: After a long thinking, I chose this item. It was the very thing I thought. I am satisfied how it look like and sturdiness. It’s not real wood, but not looks cheap. I assembled them by myself who is an around fifty woman. If you are a woman who is actively living, assembling alone is not so tough. It took 1-2 hours with a large size plus driver. The toughest part was unpacking boxes. You need to prepare all assemble tools, but one plus driver is enough for all process. One small scratch on each item was seen, but fortunately they were not obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Researcher

customer_reviews.title: Bad design.
customer_reviews.text: some of the shelves and other parts were not labeled, the plastic cam-bolts do not want to stay in place, still wobbly after securing all the screws. Disposable grade shelf. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Ozz Leoni

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Sauder 5 shelf bookcase is sturdy, heavy, not too hard to assemble, spacious shelves, and a nice color. However.. It did arrive with 2 shelves chipped. It would be a hassle to send it back so I'm keeping it. Arriving damaged is in a lot of reviews so maybe Sauder could include some touch up paint...
customer_reviews.author: Whaever

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shelf! The color is amazing and it’s very sturdy. Looks much more expensive than what I paid! Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Pisces0308

customer_reviews.title: I love my new shelves!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a builder, but this was so easy to assemble! It seemed intimidating at first, but following the paper and video instructions was easy to do. The finished shelves are beautiful and sturdy. I can't wait to get the matching 3 shelf one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, ordered 2 to go besides our tv stand. Plan on getting 2 tone coffee table and end tables to tie it all together. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A Pizzuro

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shelves for a narrow space in my bedroom to give me some more display space. These work perfectly! I like how it is designed, it doesn't lean up against the wall but rather, sits solidly on the floor. It is very sturdy and looks great in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: PurdueGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. There were a lot of pieces for the set up, but the directions were written very well. I could even stand it up and do everything myself (no second person) it looks great, feels like good quality, and has allowed me to now have 3 Star Trek shelves. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: 5 shelf bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It's up and being used. Didn't take long to put it together. Found out that my living room is way out of plum so we put shims under the legs on the right. Our old house has really settled.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Gartland

customer_reviews.title: Great Farmhouse Find
customer_reviews.text: Love the gray/beige color, matches perfect with my farmhouse decor! And lots of room to decorate. Love this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Dupre

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: This bookshelf is a beautiful piece. Everyone comments on it. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Cheap pressed wood. Arrived chipped on top. Looks nice all set up though.
customer_reviews.author: Darren A.

customer_reviews.title: Took time to assemble but is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This took some time to put together but the directions were spot on. Some pieces were not labeled on both shelves (I bought 2) but it was easy to figure out what they were. Great shelf so far and seems to be very sturdy. It does scratch easily so follow the directions to build it on a carpeted surface. I ended up scratching the first one a few times but was able to cover them once I added my decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 in jamocha wood finish. Placed on either side of the tv on the wall. They add a great ambience to my room.
customer_reviews.author: Saadia

customer_reviews.title: Great item, just wish it wasn't missing a few pieces of hardware.
customer_reviews.text: We love the shelves. Very sturdy and look great. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is it was missing a couple of the screws for the cam locks and I had to go to Lowe's to get the missing parts rather than waiting to have them mailed again.
customer_reviews.author: Sasu51

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived early. Instructions were very clear and easy to assemble but it was so unstable that as soon as it was standing straight, it collapsed to one side and it crumble down. Sorry, but it is a piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Montes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! The only issue we had was a missing piece. I called the customer number and they shipped out the missing part immediately and I had it within 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

product_meta.title: Sauder Trestle 5 Shelf Bookcase, Jamocha Wood finish
product_meta.description: Color:Jamocha Wood Finish| Pattern Name:5 Shelf BookcaseBring style and storage to your home with this 5-shelf bookcase from the Sauder Select collection. Showcase your awards, knick-knacks, photos and more on the five open shelves. Finished on all sides in Jamocha Wood, this versatile bookcase makes a great addition to any room in your home.
feature_bullets: Five open storage shelves for your favorite home décor
Holds books, photos, collectibles, and more
Finished on all sides for versatile placement anywhere in your home
Assembled dimensions: L: 23.543" x W: 16.614" x H: 71.142

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars885 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
